short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to set an alarm to do a workout and a new webpage pops up with a workout displayed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to do a quick and short workout that can be done anywhere with minimal equipment needed. On the popup, the user can set an alarm for when to do the workout. When the alarm goes off, a new tab opens up in the browser showing a workout that is fifteen minutes long with four exercises that are done in rotation.
